name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: We Stand Alone - Battlepack
summary: We Stand Alone – Battles of Easy Company is an expansion module for Lock 'n Load Tactical: Heroes of Normandy. Formed in 1942, and after almost two years of rigorous training, Easy Company, dropped into Normandy, France, on D-Day,
